Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected result: The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Sepolia.

Test steps: Click on three-dot menu located in the upper right corner.

Expected result: The "Customize transaction nonce" feature is set to be off by default.

Test steps: Navigate back to the main wallet screen to continue.
Notes: Click on the MetaMask logo or return to the MetaMask tab if the extension is in the expanded view mode.

Test steps: Create the transaction by clicking "Send" button.
Expected result: MetaMask popup with the recipient's address, amount to be sent, gas fee estimates is displayed.
Notes: You can use this address as a recipient's address : 0x0c54FcCd2e384b4BB6f2E405Bf5Cbc15a017AaFb

Expected result: Metamask popup with the recipient's address, amount, gas and total fees is displayed. The "Custom nonce" field with the next suggested nonce value is shown on the confirmation screen.

Test steps: Increment the suggested nonce value by one.
Expected result: In the "Custom nonce" field, enter the suggested value plus one.
Notes: The up and down increment arrows may not be functioning as intended at the moment. It would be best to refrain from using them.

Expected result: In the activity tab, the transaction is currently displayed as being in a pending state.
Notes: The transaction will remain in a pending state until the transaction with the preceding nonce value has been successfully confirmed.

Test steps: Create another transaction by clicking "Send" button.
Expected result: MetaMask popup with the recipient's address, amount to be sent, gas fee estimates is displayed.
Notes: You can use this address as a recipient's address : 0x0c54FcCd2e384b4BB6f2E405Bf5Cbc15a017AaFb

Expected result: Metamask popup with the recipient's address, amount, gas and total fees is displayed. The "Custom nonce" field with the next suggested nonce value is shown on the confirmation screen.

Test steps: Proceed to confirm the transaction using the recommended nonce value.

Expected result: Two transactions are currently pending and visible in the Activity tab. Please allow some time for these transactions to be successfully confirmed.

Test steps: Create another transaction by clicking "Send" button.
Expected result: MetaMask popup with the recipient's address, amount to be sent, gas fee estimates is displayed.
Notes: You can use this address as a recipient's address : 0x0c54FcCd2e384b4BB6f2E405Bf5Cbc15a017AaFb

Expected result: Metamask popup with the recipient's address, amount, gas and total fees is displayed. The "Custom nonce" field with the next suggested nonce value is shown on the confirmation screen.

Test steps: Reduce the suggested nonce value by one.
Expected result: In the "Custom nonce" field, enter the suggested value minus one.

Test steps: Proceed to confirm the transaction with low nonce value.

Expected result: Popup notification  about failed transaction appears: "Transaction *** failed! Nonce too low: next nonce ***, tx nonce ***.",,
